full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO LA MGON PO 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS DNGOS SU STZAL BA'I 'JAM DBYANGS ZHI KHRO SBRAGS SGRUB KYI MAN NGAG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (ZHES PA 'DI NI GANGS CAN 'GRO BA'I MGON PO RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN POS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DKAR PO GNYIS ZHI KHRO SBRAGS SGRUB KYI SGO @012 *, ,NAS SHES RAB BLO 'PHEL GYIS MAN NGAG SHIN TU GSAL BA ZHIG BRI DGOS SO ZHES BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^ 'JAM MGON SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUN BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,YI DAM 'DI'I DBANG MA THOB PA DANG SNOD MIN LA SHIN TU GSANG BA BYA'O, ,)
